TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowDebugger

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that receives workflow instance creation, execution, and termination status information from a object running inside the workflow host application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
This interface is implemented by a .NET remoting object hosted by the debugger.

Docs.param: An internally generated associated with a instance.
An internally generated associated with a workflow type.
A containing the assembly name from which the workflow type was loaded.
A containing the full path of the markup file corresponding to the workflow, or if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
A containing the md5 hash code for the workflow markup definition, or if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
A that indicates whether the workflow definition was modified dynamically.
A containing the fully qualified name of the workflow type.
A containing the workflow type name.
A containing the XAML serialized format of the workflow type.
Docs.summary: Called when a new workflow type is loaded by the workflow runtime engine in the workflow host application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called when a workflow instance is loaded from a persistence store or when the debugger is attached to a workflow host that has workflow instance already running.
